name: Starline (zengu)
description:
Welcome to Starline
Duck and weave between dangerously red obstacles in this high-speed arcade racer. You will need quick reactions and power-ups to reach the highest scores as you steer your star on an endless race through the infinite.

Controls
Move Left - Left Arrow Key / A
Move Right - Right Arrow Key / D
Fire Weapon - Spacebar
Pause - Escape
